title: PM in Muzaffarabad to distribute relief cheques among rain-hit people
content:
MUZAFFARABAD, Mar 08 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday arrived here to interact and solidarise with the people of northern parts of Azad Jammu and Kashmir affected by the heavy rains and snowfall.
The prime minister will distribute cheques among the affected people as part of the relief assistance announced by the government.
He will also meet with the Prime Minister of Azad Kashmir Chaudhry Anwarul Haq, who also received PM Shehbaz on his arrival in the AJK capital city.
